title: HIARCS 14q Chess Openings Book [Mar 2016]
description:
===========================================
 HIARCS 14q Chess Openings Book [Mar 2016]
===========================================

a strong, deep chess openings book
in standard Chessbase .ctg format*

Size: 382 MB (packed), 1.14 GB (unpacked)

-update/successor to Hiarcs 13Pro/14c/d/e/f/g/h/i/j/k/l/m/n/o/p opening books
-written by Mark Uniacke (HIARCS chess engine author) and team (see hiarcs.com)
-statistics updated with latest theory to March 31, 2016
-17,285,794 positions, 1,200,871 variations, from 2,511,474 top human/computer games
-this ongoing series of quarterly opening books contributes ~80 Elo gain per year
-beat the highly rated Rybka 4 book, scoring 55%+ in a 300 game match!
-adds 50 Elo points to the Hiarcs 14 chess engine vs included short book
-can be used with Hiarcs 14, your other favorite chess engines, or for reference
-requires a Chessbase graphic user interface (GUI) - Chessbase/Fritz/HIARCS/...*

Installation:
-Unpack the .7z file with 7-zip
-This gives 3 files (.ctb .ctg .cto)
-Open .ctg file with a Chessbase GUI
